## type [Catalog](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/platform/services/catalog/catalog.go#L4-L6>)

Catalog lists the automation services available to AREA clients

```go
type Catalog struct {
    Services []Service `yaml:"services"`
}
```

```go
type ChainLoader struct {
    // contains filtered or unexported fields
}
```

## type [Loader](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/platform/services/catalog/loader.go#L14-L16>)

<a name="Service"></a>
## type [Service](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/platform/services/catalog/catalog.go#L9-L13>)

Service describes a third\-party integration with associated actions and reactions

```go
type Service struct {
    Name      string      `yaml:"name"`
    Actions   []Component `yaml:"actions"`
    Reactions []Component `yaml:"reactions"`
}
```
